item.title: Intro to Neural Networks
item.description: What is a Artificial Neural Network? The Picture you see up there is far a way from what a real Neural Network looks like: Actually it is more similar to something like this: Deep Leaning Network The configuration showed above is nothing but a visual representation of serial Matrix Multiplications. The neural network (aka ANN that stands for Artificial Neural Networks) itself is not an algorithm, but rather a framework for many different machine learning algorithms to work together and process complex data inputs1.
